mapper.insert: INSERT INTO safe_food_info.food_additives (fa_prdlst_code, fa_pc_kor_name, fa_testitm_code, fa_t_kor_name, fa_fnprt_itm_name, fa_spec_val, fa_spec_val_sumup, fa_vald_begn_dt, fa_vald_end_dt, fa_max_val, fa_min_val, fa_injry_yn, fa_unit_name) VALUES (#{fa_prdlst_code}, #{fa_pc_kor_name}, #{fa_testitm_code}, #{fa_t_kor_name}, #{fa_fnprt_itm_name}, #{fa_spec_val}, #{fa_spec_val_sumup}, #{fa_vald_begn_dt}, #{fa_vald_end_dt}, #{fa_max_val}, #{fa_min_val}, #{fa_injry_yn}, #{fa_unit_name});
